headline: Former GOP lawmaker sounds alarm about the 'authoritarian wing' of the party
author: Tom Boggioni
sentences: Sitting in on a CNN "State of the Union" panel on Sunday morning, former Rep. Will Hurd (R-TX) tried to add some clarity regarding what to expect in the upcoming midterms elections but then issued a warning about some of his former colleagues.
